mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def solve_system_of_equations(equations):
    A = np.array([eq[:3] for eq in equations])
    B = np.array([eq[4] for eq in equations])
    solution = np.linalg.solve(A, B)
    return [round(x) for x in solution]
